entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a fifth-year prefect from each House, looking thoroughly disgruntled.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having his eyes closed and guessing who the Slytherin prefect is.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as confirming his worst fear of Malfoy being a prefect.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the Slytherin prefect, confirmed by Harry.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is mentioned as a complete cow and a prefect, despite being 'thicker than a concussed troll'.

entities.name: ernie macmillan
entities.description: Ernie Macmillan is mentioned as one of the Hufflepuff prefects.

entities.name: hannah abbott
entities.description: Hannah Abbott is mentioned as one of the Hufflepuff prefects.

relationships.description: Hermione mentions that Malfoy is a Slytherin prefect, confirming Harry's worst fear.
Ron mentions Hannah Abbott as one of the Hufflepuff prefects.
Hermione expresses her disgust at Pansy Parkinson being a prefect, despite being 'thicker than a concussed troll'.
Harry confirms his worst fear of Malfoy being a prefect.
